alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Lac Qui Parle; Swift; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 15 at 2:31AM CST until February 15 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Lac Qui Parle, Swift, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Chippewa; Lac Qui Parle; Swift; Yellow Medicine
